Text: You have to be fuckin kidding with all the zip files..... Dont bother with this fuk-head folks!

The files are rar, not zip. The windows command line version of unrar is free:

http://www.rarlab.com/rar/unrarw32.exe

If you can't be bothered use a free command line tool, you certainly don't deserve any free movie viewing.

You just have to extract all the (frikkin) .rar files in a desired place, and it will come in an .avi format. 

I don't understand why you couldn't do it yourself and upload it as one file.

Anyway, thanks for uploading!
